tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Recycling_materials (
  material_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  weight DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  volume DECIMAL NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE CollectionRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT,
    collection_date DATE,
    collected_weight DECIMAL,
    collected_volume DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE materials (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(255),
  weight FLOAT,
  volume FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE collection_centers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  center_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE collections (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_id INT,
  collection_center_id INT,
  collection_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE recycling_companies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(255),
  contact_person VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)
CREATE TABLE material_types ( material_id INT PRIMARY KEY, material_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description TEXT, weight FLOAT NOT NULL, volume FLOAT NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE collection_centers ( center_id INT PRIMARY KEY, center_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, contact_person VARCHAR(255), capacity FLOAT NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE collections ( collection_id INT PRIMARY KEY, center_id INT NOT NULL, material_id INT NOT NULL, collection_date DATE NOT NULL, weight_collected FLOAT NOT NULL, volume_collected FLOAT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (center_id) REFERENCES collection_centers(center_id), FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES material_types(material_id) );
CREATE TABLE employees ( employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY, employee_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, position VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, contact_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL, hire_date DATE NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE transactions ( transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, collection_id INT NOT NULL, employee_id INT NOT NULL, transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, transaction_amount FLOAT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (collection_id) REFERENCES collections(collection_id), FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id) );
